text: Sept-Rivières—Caniapiscau is a census division (CD) of Quebec, with geographical code 97. It consists of the regional county municipalities of Sept-Rivières and Caniapiscau. The division had a population of 39,500 in the Canada 2011 Census. Of that total, 25,686 people, 65 per cent of the division's entire population, reside in the city of Sept-Îles. ==Geographic hierarchy== Geographic hierarchy: Sept-Rivières--Caniapiscau (Census division) {| class="wikitable sortable" !
